Schizophrenia To The Rescue

February 2010

Today many of us lost our integrity.

Instead being complete we fill our selves with roles we play.

If you are complete your are questionable. And we have no tolerance in this world — completeness, reaching one’s limits is the sign of the all-rejected weakness.

You should keep walking ‘til death. The path doesn’t matters.

This essay is about the world. With focus on values, schizophrenia, integrity.
Business Opportunity
The XXI Century
